messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
I don’t have any location information yet. Could you share your current latitude and longitude (or another clue about where you are), so I can look it up?
I'm not sure of my latitude and longitude either.

No problem—if you’re not sure of your exact coordinates, we can try other clues. Could you describe anything nearby? For example:

• Names of streets, highways, or intersections  
• Landmarks (monuments, mountains, rivers, famous buildings)  
• Nearby businesses, schools, or stations  
• The time zone you’re in or the current local time compared to GMT/UTC  
• Anything else distinctive about your surroundings  

With even a small detail or two, I can usually narrow down the possibilities.
I don't have that information either, sorry!

I’m afraid I can’t guess your location without at least one piece of information—coordinates, a landmark, a street name, a nearby business, even your current time and time zone. If you can share any detail at all (no matter how small), I’ll do my best to help identify your city.
